column2: an A.M. Eatery////Excellent and worth the wait (and price tag - family of 5 was $90 after tip). My wife and I prefer their savory dishes like the Spuds Deluxe and the Breakfast Burrito
column3: also their sausage links are delicious.  The kids loved the pancakes - specifically the Blueberry Danish ones
column4: they have tasty lemon cream in the center.  Also
column5: the apple juice was an unexpected delight.  The coffee was said to be really good - I thought it was just ok. I did have a macchiato too
column6: it was pretty good. We'll be back again.
